name: Doors Inc. Work in Peace
description:
An Evil CEO revived you just so you could get back to work in his evil company!

Take control of various robot bodies and stop his madness at all costs!

Game made for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022!

CONTROLS:

Use ASD to move;

Mouse for aiming and LMB for shoot;

E to dash;

F in order to interact with buttons

ADITIONAL INFORMATION:

All of the game's coding can be accessed here: https://gitlab.com/NixonMSilva/gamedev.tv-project/
